      • makeEmpty

        public void makeEmpty()

      • createNewNode

        public Node<E> createNewNode()
        Description copied from interface: LinkedList
        Creates a new node instance of the type of nodes that the linked list uses. The new node will have all its instance fields initialized to null. The new node is not linked to the list in any way.
        Specified by:
        createNewNode in interface LinkedList<E>
        Returns:
        reference to the new node instance.
